title: report
description: The Report object is used to relay related cyber threat intelligence via a set of related STIX objects which provide context and details.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `report`.

labels.description: This field is an Open Vocabulary that specifies the primary subject of this report. The suggested values for this field are in report-label-ov.

name.description: The name used to identify the Report.

description.description: A description that provides more details and context about Report.

published.description: The date that this report object was officially published by the creator of this report.

published_precision.description: The precision of the published field.

report_refs.description: Specifies other top-level objects that are referred to by this Report
